website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a Battle Tower, Steel-type Pokémon, and Pokémon Eggs for the first time, it’s just as much fun to catch ‘em all in 2001’s Pokémon Crystal back then as it is today.
pros: Perfectly emulated classic Game Boy game
Import your Pokémon from Crystal to current-generation 3DS Pokémon games
cons: Pokémon Crystal’s visuals aren’t nearly as impressive as what you would see in modern games

customer_reviews.title: Johto Journey!
customer_reviews.text: Digital code was immediately accessible upon purchase and the game downloaded without any issues. Pokemon Crystal is the best of the Generation II Pokemon games and features the Battle Tower, female character, and animated sprites. Looking forward to having a nostalgic Johto Journey!
customer_reviews.author: BWHEEZYY

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this game on the gameboy advanced, so excited to have it now on my 2DS!! Works great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed playing this game as a kid and I still ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed playing this game as a kid and I still enjoy it as an adult. The retro graphics definitely pull on the nostalgia strings. If you ever need to burn some time, this is the franchise for you!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The Best Classic Pokémon on the 3DS Virtual Console
customer_reviews.text: It’s a digital code that lets you play a classic from the Game Boy Color era. Code is easy to put in the 3DS eShop, and everything went well. The game itself is classic Pokémon gameplay. If you’re thinking about purchasing any of the classic Pokémon games on 3DS, get this one. It’s a bang for your buck, and it even includes content from Red and Blue. Only thing that it doesn’t have is a Pikachu following you around, like in Yellow, but that’s okay. Enjoy it! It even has online capabilities, as far as I’m concerned. You can also trade with anyone else who owns Crystal, Gold, Silver, Red, and Blue on their 3DS.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: The code showed up instantly after purchase & I can say this is the best pokemon game ever in my opinion. I used to play this game all the time & glad I can replay it on the 3DS after all these years. Reason why I like it is because you get 2 full blown regions to explore. The graphics are extremely nostalgic, the Pokémon sprites are nostalgic, & in general it's a rememberable game. If you haven't played Pokemon Crystal I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: WT9009

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Great classic to revisit. Still 5 stars, but no save states like on an emulator. If you want to start a new adventure in the game you must save over (hence deleting) the previous save file. Pokemon can easily be transferred to another gen 1 or gen 2 game by having two 2ds/3ds systems on the same wifi, visiting a pokemon (trade) center on both games and following the options on the lower screen. One can buy two 2ds systems for the price of one 3ds, which is worth it if you want to trade.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This used to be my favorite Pokémon game
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my favorite Pokémon game! So happy to play it again. Code was delivered right away and the download was fast and easy.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!

So, with a quick Amazon search, I found this and easy, simple and quick, i'm playing Crystal version the moment I'm writing this review. The code is available as soon as you purchase, just go to "view download code", it's that simple.

product_meta.title: Pokémon Crystal - 3DS [Digital Code]
product_meta.description:
Platform:3DS Digital Code| Edition:Standard

Originally released for the Game Boy Color system in 2000, the Pokémon Crystal game added several new features to the Pokémon franchise. For the first time, players could choose a female or male character, Pokémon battles featured animation, and more. This Virtual Console release invites you to explore the Johto region again—or for the first time.Experience an adventure through Johto based on the Pokémon Gold and Pokémon Silver games, but with updated features and added story elements.Get the chance to encounter the Mythical Pokémon Celebi in an event after completing the main adventure.Meet the mysterious character Eusine and find out how he's linked to the Legendary Pokémon Suicune.Battle and trade with friends using local wireless. **Additional games and systems required. Sold separately.With the paid service Pokémon Bank, you'll be able to bring Pokémon you have caught in Pokémon Crystal into the Pokémon Sun, Pokémon Moon, Pokémon Ultra Sun, and Pokémon Ultra Moon games!​



System Requirements: * Supported Platforms:Nintendo - 3DS


Nintendo account required for game activation and installation
